column4: Picking myself up a netbook but thinking on getting either a 1gig ram model of 2gig.  Does anyone know if the 2gig will consume allot more battery life?
Im ordering the Ubuntu Dell miniV .. its loaded with Ubuntu, thats why I was aksing.
ok well it's still offtopic really for this channal
your question is hardware realted not software related in anyway really hence  being off topic really as far as I know
they do, but only security updates
like standard releases only security updates from the repo
oh it didn't say there ok
18 months of support on the desktop,  3 years on the server
don't get it yet, unless your a developer
If you want to get it early maybe the Beta  on  October 1st
or  maybe alpha, but  you will have to clean install  when the final is out really for sure probably, if you do  an alpha

yes alpha so bugs etc, that's expected,   and  this isn't the first  time I done alpha, but  like after last time, I said  I woudn't do it untill beta, but  I still did,   next time round I will stay with Karmic as host, and  virtual machine the development version,   and do a clean install as each one comes out
indeed  8.10 is better than 9.04 in certain ways, and they even mess with shutdown and logout in 9.04
